website_summaries.verdict: Great mattress that provides a slight reduction in waves, but still keeps the feel of a good night's sleep on a waterbed.
pros: Sleeps harder than a free flow mattress
cons: The foam in this mattress is much thinner than others on the market designed for a "waveless" night's sleep

customer_reviews.title: Best bed I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: We've had waterbeds for decades. But I've never had one that feels like this. Just the perfect amount of movement. Our old bed was free wave, and we sloshed along with the waves. It also developed a big bubble in the middle from time to time, like a large hump. This bed is totally flat on top, and stays that way, due to the layer of support inside. It's thick, solid, and beautiful. Best waterbed experience I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: David Wright

customer_reviews.title: Na
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable thinking about buying another one just in case they stop making them amd we need another replacement
customer_reviews.author: Lori Wood

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It’s always a guess when ordering a new mattress. This one had weird corners that made placing it in the frame a little awkward. It has two valve openings to choose from. It has been the most comfortable mattress we have had yet! We really like it. It has foam to reduce waves. It has a bit more waves than our previous mattress, but the level of comfort is wonderful. I can’t say anything about durability as we’ve only had the mattress a few months. So far, this is our favorite mattress.
customer_reviews.author: D_Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great mattress.
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and great price! Waves stop pretty quickly for a semi-waveless. Very durable, our 9 month old Golden Retriever puppy, who is 65 pounds, has run across it a few times now and no problem. Setup was a breeze and it has 2 openings so you can get air out as you're filling it. Really impressed by the quality for the price. Nice, thick vinyl makes it really trustworthy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Renner

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mattress. We sleep so much better. We have had a waterbed for 34 years. This is one of the best mattresses we have had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: We had this mattress for just over a year and a seem broke and water came pouring out like you had just stuck a knife in it. It was very comfortable but totally disappointed in the quality. We had our old mattress for probably 20 years or more. It had many patches but it was obviously much better quality than they make these days. We will be moving on from the waterbed era after this purchase. Not worth the headache and mess.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not a waveless mattress but comfortable nonetheless.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent priced mattress but be warned it does slosh and make waves even with the slightest movements.
customer_reviews.author: J.P. Young

customer_reviews.title: My parents love it. So worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My parents love it. So worth the money. They couldnt believe how good the product is. Recommended for any one with a water bed. My parents are in thier 50s. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these a few years back, this is NOT the same quality of mattress. It needs constant burping and is stretching out really fast. We are NOT overweight people, just average weight, it should not be doing this. Will be looking for another mattress manufacturer soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mar2345

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress nice thick vinyl and reinforced corners just as ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice mattress nice thick vinyl and reinforced corners just as the description states. I would consider this more of a full wave than a semi-waveless
customer_reviews.author: Kat Jakubiec

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is carefully made from appropriately heavy materials. I have only 2 negative impressions: the material for the water inlet/closure is unduly stiff, and difficult to pull out for filling, and push in after filling, also, the interior foam is not as thick as I would expect for a "semi-waveless" design.
customer_reviews.author: Physics At Work

customer_reviews.title: Did not even last one year.
customer_reviews.text: Did not even last one year. A leaking waterbed is a hassle. Could not find company to ask about warranty. I would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Guy Lamunyon

customer_reviews.title: Like the Semi Wave
customer_reviews.text: I had a full wave for years before this mattress . I like this mattress much better. It is exactly what it says me and my wife like it a lot you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Misty E

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is wonderful, it came in an orderly time frame and is the best mattress we've had. Product is made of good and soft material.
customer_reviews.author: sharon Word

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! Pondered getting rid of waterbed after 30 years ...
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! Pondered getting rid of waterbed after 30 years due to age of mattress and multiple patched holes but thought we would try this for the great price! FITS PERFECT & SO COMFORTABLE! THANK YOU! 😀
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Edinger

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fill and to remove air pockets.
customer_reviews.text: I like the Semi Waveless Mattress and very comfortable sleeping on it. Me and my German Shepherd sleep on it and she loves it. So do I!
customer_reviews.author: Keith S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and comfortable. It's more wavey then I had thought but my husband and I actually like it. We never wake each other up moving around as the waves stop right away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Next one I buy will be less motion for the price this is a good waterbed mattress
customer_reviews.author: steven haight

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: Glad to be back on a waterbed!!! This one is a little wavier than our previous model, but overall we are very, very satisfied. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: C.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Been sleeping on water beds for 37 years and this has to be one of the best mattress we have used.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Matthews

customer_reviews.title: It’s not Semi waveless
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was NOT semi waveless. I have been sleeping on a waterbed 34 years, It moves to much, but for the price, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Santana

customer_reviews.title: Good product Missing Items!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mattress was as described but did not receive all other items in the listing. No fill kit or water conditioner in shipment. Had to go out and purchase to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: Works for me, it's a bed , looks like it works , happy with product
customer_reviews.author: David Schweickert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: mattress is great, did not have fill kit or conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Alan H.

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly. It isn't as waveless as I expected ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. It isn't as waveless as I expected. Overfilled quickly and I had to release some of the water.
customer_reviews.author: tucdave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Mattress, liner and heater all top quality. We should have ordered a mattress pad as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Belawski

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable waterbed mattress I have ever had.......it did take 3 days to heat up, but I always fill with straight cold water, so...VERY HAPPY with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: did not receive everything we were supposed to get
customer_reviews.text: we got a mattress in a box. No fill kit, no 4 ounce water treatment, no packing list.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Semi-Waveless Mattress
customer_reviews.text: First time ordering a semi-waveless waterbed mattress (I had a free flow mattress for years). Very comfortable! So far, it appears to be a quality mattress.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying good seller
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed with the speed of delivery of the mattress. The instructions to fill up the mattress with water was easy to understand. A good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs ELim

customer_reviews.title: Thank God for the Internet. Save me so much time.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, Had my other mattress since 2005 It started leaking one morning went, online found this waterbed and bought it. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: G. Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Great Waterbed Mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is very comfortable and very durable. We just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kuenzel

customer_reviews.title: product perfect, very happy to do business
customer_reviews.text: Delivery on time, product perfect, very happy to do business with
customer_reviews.author: remynews

customer_reviews.title: Floating in Sleep Again
customer_reviews.text: We are loving it. We had to replace our waterbed after 30 years and it was great to get one so quickly and at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It even gave with the parts you need to fill it and the water conditioner. Fantastic price. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is good it does the job not entirely what I expected ...
customer_reviews.text: It is good it does the job not entirely what I expected but it's it's Joe
customer_reviews.author: Dulumal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Moves a little to much but really comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... this new mattress this weekend and found it as good as my original
customer_reviews.text: I set up this new mattress this weekend and found it as good as my original. No negative yet still to early, but very happy
customer_reviews.author: jim culbertson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: works great. Very fast shipping. Highly recommend this product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonflykelli

customer_reviews.title: it feels great and keeps it shape even when filling it full
customer_reviews.text: First semi-waveless mattress I have owned, it feels great and keeps it shape even when filling it full, no dome in the middle. Filled in 20 minutes. Have had spinal fusion and support is great and easy to get out of.
customer_reviews.author: logcabbin

customer_reviews.title: So far so good..
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.... very nice waterbed. It is almost a wave less I wouldn't say semi wave. Very tough and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mattress
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for my Mother. She has had one for years, and when the old one finally got too many holes, she went to the tube type, which was a big mistake. Nothing like a waterbed for great sleeping comfort.
customer_reviews.author: B. C.

customer_reviews.title: waterbed
customer_reviews.text: we purchased this mattress and it is the perfect size and was easy to fill up and set up, arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lewis

customer_reviews.title: waterbed mattress
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and was as described. I would say that it is more heavy duty than our last mattress, which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Hard
customer_reviews.text: This is the lowest semi waveless waterbed possible. The least wavy is 7000, this one is 1000. I'm not sure exactly why, but this mattress is HARD. It feels like we're sleeping on the floor instead of on water. Our last mattress was made better, more waveless, and extremely comfortable. My husband and I both dislike this mattress. I guess for the price it's fine. But we'll definitely be getting a new and pricier mattress to ensure comfort. The one good thing is that it is a california king which are hard to come by. Fits perfectly in our cali king frame.
customer_reviews.author: Kammi

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love my new mattress easy to fill and decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Leckner

customer_reviews.title: Floating on a lily pad
customer_reviews.text: Good mattress. But the internal fiber matt floats to the surface and partially supports your body. Thus taking away some of that good old zero pressure point water bed feel. Very little wave reduction. I would prefer a free flow mattress to avoid the surface firmness.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be too wavey but it's just right and you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: James Shamis

customer_reviews.title: We love the mattress
customer_reviews.text: We love the mattress. We were very happy to receive it as soon as we did. Thank you so much for the great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: lewis fletcher

customer_reviews.title: It's just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I've bought from this company. The first one lasted 10 years. it's exactly what we wanted are are pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Boteho

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It isn't as thick of vinyl as the last one we owned, but I'm sure it will do the job. It had a new vinyl smell for awhile, but it seems to have dissipated.
customer_reviews.author: R. Christian

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to put in frame. Unfolded like a dream while being filled. Only miscue: the filler screw cap was a little iffy, so we ordered a new one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wegter

customer_reviews.title: Back to waterbed.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it set up. Have used water beds for 42 years. tried to switch to air bed. Horrible experience with Fox airbeds. Back to the water bed. seems to be OK. Only complaint ...no patch kit included. I guess you go to Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: rotiron

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! it is the best Mattress out of the 27 years I have had the waterbed!! Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Marylyn Holey

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I am sooo happy I finally replaced my old waterbed mattress. This is a very quality product and I couldn't be happier with this mattress. It is very well constructed and made of a nice heavy mil vinyl.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love our waterbed - and so nice to get our mattress so easily! We are enjoying it again!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lange

customer_reviews.title: like stepping back in time....
customer_reviews.text: We had a waterbed years ago that was so comfortable that I could go to bed with a crummy backache and wake up pain free and refreshed. This is just as wonderful! The material it's constructed with is very thick, durable and well put together. This time we purchased one that was semi waveless and it is perfect. We would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisbo

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The waterbed matteress was as expected and arrived in the time specified. The only minor issue was the color. The last one I had was clear so you could see the air bubbles to make it easier to remove them.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Superb quality, extras from the vendor make it a good value, & the hard-to-find size was not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: vayaconhuevos

product_meta.title: California King 72 x 84 Semi Waveless Waterbed Mattress
feature_bullets: 24 Mil Vinyl with Extra Reinforced Corners
If you have want the school semi wave mattress then you just found it.
Our semi waveless mattress has about 8-10 seconds of movement
Mattress comes with a 4oz bottle of Premium Clear Bottle Conditioner & Fill Kit. Don't settle for less.
